hero.title: Welcome to Código Certo Coders.
hero.body: Join our community of passionate developers

infosSection.title: What we offer
infosSection.body: At Código Certo Coders, we offer a wide range of resources and opportunities to boost your personal and professional development in the technology field. We are committed to providing an environment that fosters learning, collaboration, and innovation.

trails.title: FrontEnd Jr
trails.subtitle: This project aims to create a web page where candidates can present themselves, share their personal interests, and explain why they want to join the Codigo Certo Coders community and participate in volunteer projects.

trails.title: BackEnd Jr
trails.subtitle: This project aims to develop a RESTful API for task management, providing CRUD functionalities (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for tasks, user authentication, and data storage in a database.

trails.title: FullStack Jr
trails.subtitle: This project aims to develop a complete web application for project management, along with a back-end server. The web application will allow users to list, register, edit, and delete projects, each containing a title and description.

trails.title: Quality Assurance Jr
trails.subtitle: The main goal of this project is to develop a simple test plan for the Codigo Certo Coders community website, assessing basic software testing knowledge, including planning, execution, and reporting.

trails.title: Data Science Jr
trails.subtitle: This project aims to perform a basic data analysis using Python, exploring a predefined dataset to extract simple insights through descriptive statistics and graphical visualizations.

trails.title: UX/UI Designer Jr
trails.subtitle: This project aims to develop the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) for a homepage for the Codigo Certo Coders community.

trails.title: DevOps Jr
trails.subtitle: The main goal of this project is to introduce and practice fundamental DevOps concepts by implementing a CI/CD pipeline for a simple web application.
